titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the establishing of the peace and quiet of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... White-Hall, the 14. of Iune, in the second yeere of our reigne ... .
In this state the arms show two leaves between the lion's legs (arms 21). Steele notation: care, of 2) charge his.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
